input_args.text: 'Written by Daniel McAdams   According to the Washington Post, President Obama did a 180 degree turn in Syria and will begin attacking al-Qaeda\'s affiliate in the country. The five year "Assad must go" strategy lies in tatters, as Assad will likely still be in power when it\'s time for Obama to go. What are the implications of this shift? We discuss on today\'s Liberty Report: Copyright © 2016 by RonPaul Institute. Permission to reprint in whole or in part is gladly granted, provided full credit and a live link are given.'
